title: An Act protecting the Commonwealth’s gaming industry

abstracts.abstract: By Representative Roy of Franklin, a petition (accompanied by bill, House, No. 496) of Jeffrey N. Roy relative to the gaming industry of the Commonwealth.  Economic Development and Emerging Technologies.

actions.description: Referred to the committee on Economic Development and Emerging Technologies

related_entities.name: committee on Economic Development and Emerging Technologies
